attributes.action: Have a guaranteed minimum wage for self employed childminders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a childminder and i earn £2.80 per hour as i only have one child in my care despite campaigns to encourage more people to go to work and leave their child with a carer. There are now too many childminders and not enough children to fill the spaces. I work 50 hours a week and only earn £140 per week before all my work related expenses are paid. I would like the goverment to top up our wages when we have empty spaces, otherwise many of us will give up the career in favour of better paid jobs with less hours, equating to a shortage of childcare in the future. We are enticed into this career by being told it is highly paid, then when we qualify it is completly different.
